heading: Commissioner’s request for corrective action
text:
As an alternative to the issuance of an order or notice of violation, the
commissioner may issue a request for corrective action to any person responsible for any claimed unlawful use or condi tion in any
premises. Each request for corrective action shall have the commissioner’s signature affixed thereto; but the commissioner may
authorize any subordinate to affix such signature, including an electronic signature.
